column2: IDEA-76357 Favorites View improvements: add expand all

column3: Doesn't solve the issue completely, just the last part.

We don't provide the Expand All button in Project view and Favorites view intentionally. A user can add a large subtree (i.e. a module) to Favorites, and trying to expand it recursively will lock the UI for a very long time.
IDEA-76357 Favorites View improvements: add expand all
